browser.title: Browser upload:
browser.list_item_1: Put all of your game files into one folder and upload the folder.
browser.list_item_2: An index.html file MUST be included in the folder. The index.html can also be the entire game.
browser.list_item_3: If you're uploading a Unity WebGL game, then include the index.html, .data, .framework, .loader, and .wasm files in the folder.

mobile_pc.title: Mobile/PC upload:
mobile_pc.text: Please zip your game files in a folder and then upload the zipped file. Players will be able to download the zipped file.

manage_nfts.title: Previously created collections
manage_nfts.no_collections: You have no collections created yet...

create.title: Create new collection
create.error: There was some error while creating collection. Please try again!

upload.title: Upload Image Asset to NFT Collection
upload.assetId_input_helper: Image asset id can be any text that uniquely idetifies this image, which can later get used for mintting and airdropping images linked to these image asset ids
upload.error: Sorry something happend... try again later
upload.input_helper_upload_asset: Specify an image you would like to store in your NFT canister, which can be referenced using the Asset Id you assign to this image. You can use this Asset Id to mint an NFT with this image dynamically from in-game. Note: Only use PNG or JPG images if you're using Unity because Unity doesn't support SVG.

view.title: View All Image Asset Ids
view.button: Get All Asset Ids of Collection

asset.title: View Image Asset
asset.error: No image asset with this asset id uploaded...

token.error: We did not find this token.

add.error: There was some error while adding controller. Please try again!

burn.title: Burn an NFT
burn.error: There was some error while burning NFT. Please try again!

mint.title: Mint or Batch Mint NFTs
mint.error: There was some error during mint. Please try again!
mint.input_placeholder_mint_number: Number of NFTs to mint per principal/address
mint.input_helper_burn: If you specify a timestamp, the NFT will automatically get sent to the burn address when that timestamp is reached. You must specify the timestamp in milliseconds using the UNIX timestamp standard.
mint.textarea_addresses: Comma-separated list of principals or addresses
mint.upload_placeholder_helper: NFT image asset id, which you used to upload your Nft image, from Configure Images Tab.

airdrop.title: Airdrop NFTs to holders of an NFT collection
airdrop.error: There was some error during airdrop. Please try again!
airdrop.checkbox_prevent: Prevent a single principal receiving multiple NFTs
airdrop.input_placeholder_canister: Canister id of the NFT collection you want to airdrop to holders of
airdrop.input_helper_canister: We will fetch all the holders of the NFT collection canister id and mint an NFT to each of the holders. If you check the 'Prevent a single principal receiving multiple NFTs' checkbox then it will mint only one NFT to each holder even if they own multiple NFTs in the collection.
airdrop.input_helper_burn: If you specify a timestamp, the NFT will automatically get sent to the burn address when that timestamp is reached. You must specify the timestamp in milliseconds using the UNIX timestamp standard.
airdrop.button: Mint NFTs to holders of an NFT collection

approve.title: Approve Spender to Transfer on your behalf
approve.input_helper_approve_to: Entitles the Spender account to transfer token amount on behalf of the caller from account. The number of transfers the spender can initiate from the caller's account is unlimited as long as the total amounts and fees of these transfers do not exceed the allowance.
